TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A benign (not cancer) tumor that usually forms in the breast from both fibrous and glandular tissue. Fibroadenomas are the most common benign breast tumors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tumor benigno (no canceroso) que, por lo general, se forma tanto en el tejido fibroso como glandular de la mama. Los fibroadenomas son los tumores benignos de mama m√°s comunes.
